description.en:
Fresh adds shelf life to your produce and bales - crops age over time and will spoil if not sold or used!
Your harvested crops, processed products, and baled forage now have realistic shelf lives. Fresh vegetables spoil quickly, while canned products last much longer. Bales of grass spoil within days, while silage stays fresh for months. Customize shelf lives via the Fresh Menu!
Fresh Menu (Right Shift+F): - Inventory Overview: see all perishables with oldest ages - Loss Statistics: track what you've lost - Settings: customize shelf lives for any product
Features: - Supports basegame, DLCs, and maps/mods products - Configure shelf life for any fillType in Settings - Age distribution bars (color-coded: blue=fresh, green=good, orange=warning, red=critical) - 100+ products with realistic default shelf lives - 4 bale types with fermentation handling - Vehicles, bales, silos, productions, husbandries supported - Oldest items retrieved first from storage - Daily loss notifications - Multiplayer support (server-authoritative) - Ages saved with your game
Notes: - Early access - feedback welcome
Documentation: https://github.com/rittermod/FS25_Fresh
Changelog:
0.7.1.0 (Alpha): - Fixed TMR mixer output tracking - FORAGE amount now correctly tracks all ingredients - Fixed pig feed (PIGFOOD) losing age when deposited into pigsty - Fixed containers not aging after enabling expiration for a previously disabled product - Fixed vehicle showing wrong product freshness after refilling with a product set to 'do not expire' - Fixed false error log when registering Fresh Menu keybinding in vehicle context
0.7.0.0 (Alpha): - Added support for ALL fillTypes - basegame, DLCs, and maps/mods now configurable - Improved Settings sorting - products with types appear first for easier navigation - Added tooltips in Settings showing fillType details (internal name, type classification)
0.6.1.0 (Alpha): - Fixed age distribution showing on empty vehicles/placeables (floating point precision issue)
0.6.0.0 (Alpha): - Added age distribution HUD: colored freshness bars when near placeables and vehicles - Added toggle in Settings to enable/disable age distribution display - Fixed freshness display to show per fillType - Fixed expiration info only showing for perishable fillTypes
0.5.0.0 (Early Access): - Added Fresh Menu (Right Shift+F) with inventory, statistics, and settings - Added configurable shelf lives per product - Added loss tracking with daily notifications - Improved transfer handling (batch ages preserved) - Rebuilt core architecture for stability
0.4.0.0 (Alpha 5): - Added placeable storage tracking (silos, productions, husbandry) - Added husbandry feed tracking - Added expiring count display for placeables - Added multiplayer sync for placeable storage
0.3.0.0 (Alpha 4): - Added bulk vehicle tracking (trailers, tankers, combines) - Expanded from pallets to all vehicles with fill capacity
0.2.0.0 (Alpha 2): - Added bale perishability with 4 forage types - Added bale storage aging (barns/sheds) - Added fermenting bale handling
0.1.0.0 (Alpha 1): - Initial alpha release - Added perishable goods system for 100 product types - Added multiplayer support and savegame persistence
